item.title: Bomb Threats And Bad Ballots Mark Election Day In New Jersey
item.description: 'Democrats are once again trying to change election rules at the last minute to count ineligible ballots,' Chairman Joe Gruters said.

item.title: Justice Jackson Is The Supreme Courtâ€™s Mean Girl
item.description: Jackson has completely forgone the Kagan approach of building bridges instead of burning them.

item.title: The Attacks On Heritage And Kevin Roberts Are Really About Foreign Policy And J.D. Vance
item.description: Genuine concern about antisemitism on the right is being hijacked by neocons to attack J.D. Vance in hopes of re-taking control of the GOP.

item.title: Chester County PA Poll Books Missing Names Of 75,000 Voters In Election Day Error
item.description: It means independent and unaffiliated voters must cast provisional ballots for now.

item.title: Report: Radical Leftist Groups Perpetuate Homeless Crisis For Their Own Benefit
item.description: The industrial homelessness complex, in many cases, has used advocacy for the homeless as a front for all kinds of radical causes.
